data.name: Sánchez de Aguilar reduction
data.desc: Valladolid-based alcalde ordinario of Bacalar Juan Sánchez de Aguilar creates reduction towns of Petentzub and Zaczuz near Tipu
data.prim_n: MEXICO,148,R.1,N.27 [a sd 1630] / MEXICO,[missg] [Title of encomienda towns in Bacalar province a sd 1622] / CONTADURIA,912
data.note: In 1622, when these [Petentzub, Zaczuz, Tipuj] and other reductions were finally organised as a new encomienda, they turned out to be small communities with a total of only 136 casados. /v Jones
